snippet: Embarrassed by the Toronto Raptors 13 days ago, the Atlanta Hawks made up for that poor performance in the rematch....
lead_paragraph: Embarrassed by the Toronto Raptors 13 days ago, the Atlanta Hawks made up for that poor performance in the rematch.

headline.main: Howard Scores 27 as Hawks End Raptors' 4-Game Win Streak
